description: This heavenly sorbet is spiked with a very small amount of rose water, which you can find in Middle Eastern markets I prefer to strain out the raspberry seeds before freezing.
title: Raspberry Rose Sorbet
title_page: Raspberry Rose Sorbet Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This heavenly sorbet is spiked with a very small amount of rose water, which you can find in Middle Eastern markets. I prefer to strain out the raspberry seeds before freezing.
Featured in: Fruit By The Frozen Spoonful.
Learn: How to Make Ice Cream
